title: In the area of Regional Plans, 50% of the amount of premium collected should be paid to the Government through the District offices of Town Planning and Valuation Department and remaining 50% to the Project Implementing Authority
clause_text: In the area of Regional Plans, 50% of the amount of premium collected should be paid to the Government through the District offices of Town Planning and Valuation Department and remaining 50% to the Project Implementing Authority.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
